name: portfolio-backup-function
description: Cloud Function for automated daily backups of portfolio data

scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy backup-daily --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated=false --entry-point=backupDaily --source=. --region=us-central1
scripts.deploy-scheduler: gcloud scheduler jobs create http backup-daily-job --schedule='0 2 * * *' --uri='https://us-central1-${PROJECT_ID}.cloudfunctions.net/backup-daily' --http-method=POST --oidc-service-account-email=${SERVICE_ACCOUNT}
